localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.title:
Finance Twitter has been unbelievable these past few days

Everyone has been on their game

GameStop Twitter may rival “funding secured” Twitter at this point 

Nice work everyone
blogPost.author: Ben Carlson

localize.full_text:
财经微博这几天的表现让人匪夷所思

每个人都在玩自己的游戏

GameStop推特此时或可媲美 "资金有保障 "的推特。

大家辛苦了

財經微博這幾天的表現讓人匪夷所思

每個人都在玩自己的遊戲

GameStop推特此時或可媲美 "資金有保障 "的推特。

大家辛苦了

next.excerpt: A web app that uses spaced repetition, a sophisticated learning algorithm, and a tree-structured note-taking tool. Think Workflowy and Anki combined. It also brings together various learning theories and tricks.
next.title: LearnObit - A cognitive tool to boost learning

localize.description: 一款使用间隔重复、复杂的学习算法和树状结构的记事工具的网络应用。想想Workflowy和Anki的结合。它还汇集了各种学习理论和技巧。
一款使用間隔重複、複雜的學習算法和樹狀結構的記事工具的網絡應用。想想Workflowy和Anki的結合。它還彙集了各種學習理論和技巧。
